sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 现在的消费水平越来越高。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiànzài de xiāofèi shuǐpíng yuèláiyuè gāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le niveau de consommation actuel est de plus en plus élevé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The current consumption level is getting higher and higher.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他赢得了同事们的信任。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yíngdé le tóngshìmen de xìnrèn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a gagné la confiance de ses collègues.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has gained the trust of his colleagues.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī zhèngzài xuānchuán xīn chǎnpǐn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise fait la promotion d'un nouveau produit.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company is promoting new products.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng wǎng zuǒ zhuǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez tourner à gauche.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please turn left.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 今晚有一场精彩的演出。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīnwǎn yǒu yī chǎng jīngcǎi de yǎnchū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a un spectacle merveilleux ce soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a wonderful performance tonight.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 天气预报说明天会下雨。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tiānqì yùbào shuō míngtiān huì xiàyǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les prévisions météo annoncent de la pluie pour demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The weather forecast says it will rain tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shìshí zhèngmíng tā shì duì de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les faits prouvent qu'il avait raison.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The facts prove he was right.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè chǎng bǐsài jiāng jìnxíng zhíbō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce match sera diffusé en direct.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This match will be broadcast live.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bùyào làngfèi shíwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne gaspille pas la nourriture.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't waste food.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Háizimen zài kuàilè zhōng chéngzhǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants grandissent dans le bonheur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Children grow up in happiness.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǐngdǎo zhèngzài kāihuì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le dirigeant est en réunion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The leader is in a meeting.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngguó yǒu hěn duō měishí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La Chine a beaucoup de bons plats.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: China has many delicious foods.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yùndòngyuán měitiān dōu yào xùnliàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les athlètes s'entraînent tous les jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Athletes train every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ néng gǎnshòu dào tā de rèqíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je peux ressentir son enthousiasme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I can feel his enthusiasm.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个国家变得越来越强大。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège guójiā biàn de yuèláiyuè qiángdà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce pays devient de plus en plus puissant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This country is becoming more and more powerful.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qíshí zhè jiàn shì hěn jiǎndān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En fait, cette affaire est très simple.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Actually, this matter is very simple.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Mìngyùn zhǎngwò zài zìjǐ shǒu zhōng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le destin est entre nos propres mains.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Destiny is in our own hands.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōumò wǒmen qù páshān ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons faire de la randonnée ce week-end.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go hiking this weekend.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 时间足够完成这项工作。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shíjiān zúgòu wánchéng zhè xiàng gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le temps est suffisant pour terminer ce travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is enough time to complete this work.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nàge lǎotóur hěn hé'ǎi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce vieux monsieur est très gentil.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: That old man is very kind.
